chat.title: Project Kickoff - New Mobile App
chat.description: Our team discusses the new mobile app project and initial planning

messages.message: Good morning everyone! ğŸ‰ Excited to kick off our new mobile app project today!
Morning! I've prepared the initial requirements doc. Let me share the key features we need to build.
Can't wait to see what we're building! I've been sketching some early concepts.
Let's make sure we discuss the tech stack early on. I'm thinking React Native for cross-platform support.

Great idea Mike. Here are the main features:

1. User authentication
2. Real-time notifications
3. Social sharing
4. Offline mode
For the UI, I'm proposing a clean, minimalist design with dark mode support. Research shows our target users prefer it.
Dark mode is definitely doable. We should also consider accessibility from day one.
Love where this is going! Timeline-wise, when can we have an MVP ready?
If we scope it right, I'd say 8-10 weeks for MVP. That includes testing and polish.
Sounds realistic. I'll need a week for architecture planning and setting up the development environment.
I can have initial designs and prototypes ready in 2 weeks. That should give development a head start.
Perfect! Let's plan a follow-up meeting next week to review the designs. Great start team! ğŸ’ª
